summary: A preacher whose ancestors were cursed by Druids battles Satan, who has taken the form of a huge snake.
cast: Fritz Weaver|Gretchen Corbett|Jon Korkes|Norman Lloyd|Diana Douglas|Bob Hannah|Nancy Priddy|Christina Applegate|John McCurry|Jack Gordon|Allene Simmons|Mary Lyons McEvoy|Bill Gribble|Jamie Lawrence|Mark Richards|Sarah Wilson|William Clutton|Jordan Williams|David Fawcett|Stuart Byham|Denise Cannon|Don Isaacs|Virginia Samford|Mike Smith|Ed Crick|Rick Dowling|Pat Purcell|Cavanaugh Yelling|Pam Middaugh|Nick DeMarinis|Jane Berman|Chris Carney|Melanie Van Reeman
title: El rey de las cobras
